# defaultSubcontainerAttributeKey

**Instance Property**

Returns the value of the `DefaultSubcontainerAttribute` entry of the class dictionary from which the receiver was instantiated.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultSubcontainerAttributeKey: String? { get }
```

## Return Value

The value of the default subcontainer attribute entry. Returns `nil` if the there was no such entry.

## Getting basic information about the script class

- **className**: Returns the name of the class the receiver describes, as provided at initialization time.
- **implementationClassName**: Returns the name of the Objective-C class instantiated to implement the scripting class.
- **isLocationRequiredToCreate(forKey:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether an insertion location must be specified when creating a new object in the specified to-many relationship of the receiver.
- **suiteName**: Returns the name of the receiver’s suite.
